body.name: NexiGo N60 1080P Webcam with Microphone, Adjustable FOV, Zoom, Software Control & Privacy Cover, USB HD Computer Web Camera, Plug and Play, for Zoom/Skype/Teams, Conferencing and Video Calling
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 13. Order within 11 hrs 18 mins

features: 【Full HD 1080P Webcam】Powered by a 1080p FHD two-MP CMOS, the NexiGo N60 Webcam produces exceptionally sharp and clear videos at resolutions up to 1920 x 1080 with 30fps. The 3.6mm glass lens provides a crisp image at fixed distances and is optimized between 19.6 inches to 13 feet, making it ideal for almost any indoor use.

【Zoom in and Out】With its fixed focal length lens, this webcam can capture high-definition video at a wide-angle of up to 110°, making it perfect for presentations. Moreover, you can adjust the field of view (FOV) by using the digital zoom feature available in the NexiGo software, which helps you customize it to better fit your personal workspace. Simply plug the USB into your computer and you're all set!

【Built-in Noise-Cancelling Microphone】The built-in noise-canceling microphone reduces ambient noise to enhance the sound quality of your video. Great for Zoom / Facetime / Video Calling / OBS / Twitch / Facebook / YouTube / Conferencing / Gaming / Streaming / Recording / Online School.

【USB Webcam with Privacy Protection Cover】The privacy cover blocks the lens when the webcam is not in use. It's perfect to help provide security and peace of mind to anyone, from individuals to large companies. 【Note:】Please contact our support for firmware update if you have noticed any audio delays.

【Wide Compatibility】Works with USB 2.0/3.0, no additional drivers required. Ready to use in approximately one minute or less on any compatible device. Compatible with Mac OS X 10.7 and higher / Windows 7, 8, 10 & 11 / Android 4.0 or higher / Linux 2.6.24 / Chrome OS 29.0.1547 / Ubuntu Version 10.04 or above.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice, very affordable basic web cam
reviews.reviewText: Very good image quality. Very good sound quality and microphone sensitivity. Easy driverless installation. Simple but effective privacy cap. Packaged simply and nicely; not over packaged. Attaches easily and securely to monitor. I use dual displays and this cam sits nicely in the junction of the two monitors. It has a red LED on the left indicating power and a green LED on the right indicating when the camera is on. It does not need additional software for basic functions. Nexigo has a downloadable app that allows further fine tuning of settings. Works very well with Cisco WebEx and Microsoft Teams. Very attractively priced. What’s not to like?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up, great price, good quality
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this camera to use as an option for teletherapy sessions, and it does the job very well! It has a wide angle lens, so I use a video editing program to be able to zoom in the view some. The quality is very nice, and I like the little privacy cover that comes on it. It was an easy plug and play installation, and the price was awesome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap and good quality
reviews.reviewText: This thing is full HD and can record extremely fluidly, if you download the software you can change a lot of stuff but not as much as I would like to, very easy to set up, it has a microphone but I haven't really tested it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little webcam
reviews.reviewText: my laptop ended up going out on me so I had to rush to find a webcam for my desktop as I had a meeting coming up... worked PERFECTLY! great picture, sound quality is perfect. Love that it came with a flip cover attached (maybe they've always had that? I haven't had a webcam in a lot of years). Not disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars How you want to be seen in public...
reviews.reviewText: This camera has amazing broadcast quality.It works right out of the box, totally plug & play.It is small, and it sits right on my monitor (see picture).For pros, it has a groovy software download.The software allows you to make precise picture adjustments.It also lets you save different setups, like mirrored, inside, neon, etc.It also has an effective light on the front for three different white balance needs.The mic is very accurate. It is auto-leveling and directional.The camera plugs into any USB port. You just tap the top to turn on the light.Great camera, great value. I'm glad I bought it. Three thumbs up. Add to cart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works! Easy to install!
reviews.reviewText: Seems to work well, picture is good and installation was super easy! Great price and shipped fast! I like that I can move it around for Zoom calls. Would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good but with some issues
reviews.reviewText: I have used this for several months now and do think it is a pretty good starter webcam. The video quality is pretty good but it does tend to come out dark on youtube videos. The 2 biggest issues are all about the cord for me, the cord is short, keep that in mind and there are a lot of times that when I activate the camera to record a video or stream it shows that it is on but does not actually start recording, then it has to be unplugged and plugged back in and reactivated to get it to actually come back on. The camera also does on occasion just freeze but you have no sign it froze unless you actually look at what is being recorded on your program like OBS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up.
reviews.reviewText: This is a solid choice for streaming or other webcam needs. As described, the camera plugged in and installed itself with no trouble. The instructions were clear and to the point, making it easy to find the camera and get it up and running.The picture quality is excellent. Gets a little furry in low light conditions, but by using the optional free software, one can make the needed adjustments to get a decent view in any reasonably well lit environment.Speaking of the software, it was easy to find and download. It gives you additional control such as adjusting contrast, brightness, zoom, tilt, and others. It even allows you to save and store presets so you can recall settings that work in different locations.The only reason I didn’t give five stars is because the adhesive is so thin on the mounting pads that they don’t make very good contact on a monitor that doesn’t have a perfectly square, flat profile. Furthermore the privacy cover just kind of flaps around loosely and doesn’t stay put in the closed position except by gravity. I would like it to snap into place, but it does the job.
The things I liked about this product is that for the price the web cam works well, the picture is clear, it is also easy to use all you have to do is plug and play.
Qualidade e densidade de pixel igual ou superior a 1920p

bought this to replace the 30fps model of this camera as it died after 1 year of use. so far its been worrking fine. I have had it for around 6 months and use it weekly. good quality for Zoom and Youtube streaming. Auto focus is ok could be faster but good the the price. hope it last longer then the 30fps verson. do not recommend using it to record video for youtube just seems to be a little off on the colors, but is good for streaming

Ha sido poner la cámara y probarla y no tengo palabras. Ha superado mis expectativas con creces. La calidad de la cámara y los FPS van GENIAL, incluso en entornos oscuros no se nota casi nada el ruido de la imagen. Por este precio merece mucho la pena. El micro no es lo mejor pero es lo esperable de una webcam.En definitiva, lo recomiendo, no te arrepentirás.
